title: A Sit Down With: Najee Harris, Mitch Trubisky, T.J. Watt, Zach Gentry, Pat Freiermuth, & Tyson Alualu
description:
Cam sits down with Najee Harris, Mitch Trubisky, T.J. Watt, Zach Gentry, Pat Freiermuth, and Tyson Alualu at Steelers training camp. Najee Harris gives his best Nick Saban story and talks about Snoop Dogg calling him first after being drafted by the Steelers. Mitch Trubisky explains how the Steelers are different from the Bears and Bills, and T.J. Watt reveals what he’s doing to improve his game.
